faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Nova+, activation, and features.

q1.question: What is Nova+?
q1.answer: Nova+ is a premium IPTV player application for Android devices (phones, tablets, Android TV, and Fire TV). It allows you to stream content from M3U playlists provided by your IPTV service.

q2.question: What devices are compatible?
q2.answer: Nova+ works on Android phones, Android tablets, Android TV boxes, and Amazon Fire TV devices. Any device running Android 5.0 or higher is supported.

q3.question: What is the difference between Trial and Lifetime activation?
q3.answer: Trial activation gives you temporary access to test all features. Lifetime activation is a one-time purchase that gives you permanent access to the app with no recurring fees.

q4.question: How do I find my Device ID and PIN?
q4.answer: After installing Nova+, open the app and your unique Device ID and PIN will be displayed on the main screen. Use these credentials to log in to the User Panel on our website.

q5.question: Can I use Nova+ on multiple devices?
q5.answer: Each device requires its own activation. When you install the app on a new device, it will generate a unique Device ID and PIN that needs to be activated separately.

q6.question: What playlist formats are supported?
q6.answer: Nova+ supports M3U and M3U8 playlist formats. You can add playlists via URL or import local files from your device storage.

q7.question: How do I add a playlist?
q7.answer: Log in to the User Panel with your Device ID and PIN, go to the Playlists tab, and enter a name along with the playlist URL. Your playlist will be synced to your device automatically.

q8.question: Is there EPG (Electronic Program Guide) support?
q8.answer: Yes, Nova+ supports EPG when your playlist provider includes EPG data or when you configure an EPG URL in the app settings.

q9.question: What if my device ID changes?
q9.answer: If you reset your device or reinstall the app, a new Device ID may be generated. Contact support with your previous activation details for assistance.

q10.question: How can I become a reseller?
q10.answer: Visit our 'Become a Reseller' page to learn about our reseller program. You'll get access to a special panel to manage customer activations and earn commissions.

q11.question: Do you provide IPTV subscriptions?
q11.answer: No, Nova+ is only the player application. You need to obtain IPTV playlist subscriptions from your preferred IPTV provider separately.

q12.question: How do I contact support?
q12.answer: You can reach our support team through the Contact page on our website. We typically respond within 24-48 hours.

news.title: Latest
news.description: Stay informed about the latest updates, features, and announcements from Nova+.

n1.title: Nova+ 2.5 Released
n1.excerpt: New version brings improved performance, better EPG support, and a redesigned channel guide. Update now for the best experience.

n2.title: Fire TV Stick Support Enhanced
n2.excerpt: Optimized navigation and remote control support for Amazon Fire TV devices. Enjoy smoother browsing with your Fire TV remote.

n3.title: New Reseller Program Launch
n3.excerpt: Introducing our updated reseller program with better commissions and a dedicated reseller panel. Apply today!

n4.title: Server Infrastructure Upgrade
n4.excerpt: We've upgraded our servers for faster playlist loading and improved reliability. Experience zero downtime streaming.

n5.title: Multi-Audio Track Support
n5.excerpt: Nova+ now supports multiple audio tracks. Switch between languages on the fly for channels that offer multiple audio options.

activate.title: Activate Your
activate.description: Follow these simple steps to activate Nova+ on your device and start streaming.

activate.helpText: Find your Device ID and Device Key in the Nova+ app settings on your device.

s1.title: Install Nova+
s1.description: Download the Nova+ app from your device's app store (Android TV, Fire TV, Android Phone/Tablet).

s2.title: Get Your Credentials
s2.description: Open the app and note your unique Device ID and PIN displayed on the screen.

s3.title: Visit Our Website
s3.description: Go to the User Panel on our website and enter your Device ID and PIN to log in.

s4.title: Choose Your Activation
s4.description: Select Lifetime activation for permanent access, or try our Trial to test the features first.
